dc_title_s: Map of the Lower Raccoon Creek Basin and adjacent Ohio River tributaries showing availability of underground water
dc_description_s: Map side also contains legend and explanation of map symbols.|"Prepared by HENRY L. PREE, JR., Geologist, Ohio Division of Water"|Text includes information about generalized stratigraphic sequence of the rocks in the Lower Raccoon Creek Basin and quality of underground water.|Scale bar lower right corner of map.
